text:
────Thanks, for this live performance we're taking
on some challenging tasks, it'll surely be something special.

Even introducing us to the dance instructor...
I'm relying on you for everything.

......I didn't organize the lessons
The stage planning is also quite detailed.

......Of course
You two are focused on what happens on stage.
What happens offstage is my responsibility.

────Being entrusted with these kinds of tasks
is quite a rare opportunity.
I want to make a good stage.

......That's right. Let's finalize the songs
and everything as soon as possible.

────It might be a bit difficult...
Of course, I'll make sure to look the part.

Aketa has the time, but
I don't think she does, right?

I feel the same way
Let's make a great stage together, Mikoto.
